content: चरम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [चर्-अमच् <ls>Uṇ. 5. 69</ls>] {@--1@} Last, ultimate, final; चरमा क्रिया ‘the final or funeral ceremony.’ {@--2@} Posterior, back; पृष्ठं तु चरमं तनोः <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--3@} Old (as age). {@--4@} Outermost. {@--5@} Western, west. {@--6@} Lowest, least. --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} At last; at the end.
